Text:
FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec

http://flac.sourceforge.net/
But how come the songs are bigger than usual if they are in FLAC?
Because they are CD Quality but half the size. You can de-compress them and you have the wav file exactly as it was before
A mp3 file with high quality is usually about 320kbps a FLAC file is more then double.
